seller_description: Crafted from scratch-resistant and impact-resistant Polypropylene material, this durable trolley bag is designed to withstand the demands of travel, combining strength, style, and a unique design for the perfect travel companion. The set includes three suitcases—small cabin size, medium check-in size, and large check-in size—crafted to meet domestic and international travel standards. Effortless maneuverability is ensured with a 360-degree wheeling system for smooth navigation and stress-free travel. The integrated anti-theft combination lock keeps your belongings secure, while the luxurious interior lining adds sophistication. Proudly made in India, this luggage comes with a 3-year international warranty against manufacturing defects.
review: Got the same product as shown here. The product is well packed and in great condition. No damages,no regret, got the product in good price.
expected_output: The seller's image accurately portrays a set of scratch-resistant, stylish trolley bags in different sizes, as described in the product details. The description emphasizes durability, maneuverability, and security features, including a 360-degree wheeling system and an anti-theft combination lock. The buyer's image confirms the receipt of the same product, aligning with the seller's visual and written description. The review expresses satisfaction, stating the product was well-packed, without damage, and delivered in great condition. There are no visible discrepancies between the seller's promises and the buyer's experience. The buyer appears content with their purchase, highlighting a positive transaction. In this case, neither party is at fault as the seller delivered what was promised, and the buyer acknowledged their satisfaction.
label: 1:Here buyer agreed with the seller
